settings.label: ${entityName}

settings.cellContentFunction: return ''+value+'';

headerButton.name: Create irrigation schedule
headerButton.customHtml:
Create irrigation schedule
Name Name is required.
Start
Date Time
Stop irrigation condition Consumption Duration
Liters Volume in litters is required. Volume in litters must be greater than 0.
Duration, min Duration is required. Duration must be greater than 0.
Repeat
scheduler.repeats {{ schedulerRepeatTypes[repeatType] | translate }} scheduler.repeat-every-n-days {{ 'scheduler.repeat-days-required' | translate }} {{ 'scheduler.invalid-repeat-days-value' | translate }} scheduler.repeat-every-n-weeks {{ 'scheduler.repeat-weeks-required' | translate }} {{ 'scheduler.invalid-repeat-weeks-value' | translate }}
Interval {{ 'scheduler.time-interval-required' | translate }} Time unit {{ schedulerTimeUnits[timeUnit] | translate }} {{ 'scheduler.time-unit-required' | translate }}
End date Invalid date.

actionCellButton.name: Edit irrigation schedule
actionCellButton.customHtml:
Edit irrigation schedule '{{ entityName }}'
Name Name is required.
Start
Date Time
Stop irrigation condition Consumption Duration
Liters Volume in litters is required. Volume in litters must be greater than 0.
Duration, min Duration is required. Duration must be greater than 0.
Repeat
scheduler.repeats {{ schedulerRepeatTypes[repeatType] | translate }} scheduler.repeat-every-n-days {{ 'scheduler.repeat-days-required' | translate }} {{ 'scheduler.invalid-repeat-days-value' | translate }} scheduler.repeat-every-n-weeks {{ 'scheduler.repeat-weeks-required' | translate }} {{ 'scheduler.invalid-repeat-weeks-value' | translate }}
Interval {{ 'scheduler.time-interval-required' | translate }} Time unit {{ schedulerTimeUnits[timeUnit] | translate }} {{ 'scheduler.time-unit-required' | translate }}
End date Invalid date.

actionCellButton.name: Delete irrigation schedule

settings.cellContentFunction: return value ? ''+value+'' : '';
